answers.answer: I will be getting mine on Tuesday and wasn't worried but so many mommys on here are having issues with the drink. With my 1st son I had no problems, drank the orange flavor drink waited and hour and was fine (but that was almost 6 yrs ago). I hope it goes that smoothly this time!
Yes im due in november and im getting mine done next wensday
